title: Renault to spin off EV arm Ampere, deepens partnerships with Google and Geely
text: Renault said it will spin off its electric vehicle (EV) arm, Ampere, via a separate stock market listing next year as part of plans to split the group into five new ‘teams'. Despite launching its first electric car in the 1930s, the French company has been overtaken by old and new rivals, so its new organisational structure is aimed to allow Ampere to produce a million EVs by 2031.
